thumb.title: 【TAS WIP】Mario Forever - スーパーマリオワールド hack 主八世界+九世界
thumb.description: Mario Forever is my favorite game. Maybe it's more meaningful than the original Mario series in my mind. And we guys really wanted to make a TAS for that after the first windows TAS submitted in 2011 (https://tasvideos.org/3193S). But we didn't because Hourglass couldn't work fine at "World X Complete!" page in game. Though HappyLee made several world-by-world TAS movies for Mario Forever Advance Edition in 2016 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yAH4Rvf0nP4)...But I found this hack and making movie during these days.Thank the hacker for making this. To help me achieve what I want in more than 10 years!THANK YOU VERY MUCH!patch page：https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/6058/--------------------------------------Game resource：https://tasvideos.org/GameResources/SNES/SuperMarioWorldRAM map：https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=memorymap&game=smw&region=ram
thumb.last_res_body: タイムアップの焦... 一瞬、ロード入った？ 登れる事を示した... ＦＦ４の曲だね 自力で土管の上ま... クロノトリガーの曲だ これが一番速そう 改造マリオもここ...
